name: person
description: Any individual human mentioned in the email: sender, recipients, or anyone referenced in the content (e.g., James Cooper, Elena, Dr. Michael Anders).

name: organization
description: Any company, institution, or group mentioned in the email (e.g., Innovatech Solutions, United Nations, Amsterdam Tech Conference organizers).

name: location
description: Any physical place: cities, offices, buildings, or venues (e.g., Rotterdam, The Hague, Rotterdam office, Conference Room 3A).

name: temporal
description: Any time reference: dates, times, or relative expressions (e.g., October 28, 2025, last Thursday, 14:30, next week).

name: event
description: Any occurrence or activity: conferences, meetings, discussions, presentations, or scheduled activities (e.g., Amsterdam Tech Conference 2025, discussion about AI integration roadmap, keynote presentation, sprint review).
